ourOpusiens.title: OUR OPUCIENS
ourOpusiens.text: Un paragraphe est une section de texte en prose vouée au développement d'un point particulier souvent au moyen de plusieurs phrases, dans la continuité du précédent et du suivant. Sur le plan typographique, le paragraphe est compris entre deux alinéas, qui s'analysent aussi comme une « ponctuation blanche

opusLab.title: OPUS LAB
opusLab.description: Opus Lab is an education school specializing in Digital Skills and which provides continuous supervision to students. We have 4 departments:

succes.title: WE GUIDE YOU
succes.description: After the training, you have a final project to develop to practice everything you have learned! We support you until you complete the project and present it to our jury!

GlowingDay.title: GLOWING DAY
GlowingDay.paragraph: Glowing Day is the day for awarding certifications. During this day, students present the final project to practice well what they have learned and launch their career with a complete project. The students present their project in front of an external jury to receive the validation of the project and to have the certification.

card1.title: RESPECT THE DEADLINES
card1.description: The continuous work of the tasks and the reactivity with the instructor and especially the respect of the deadlines

card2.title: COMPLETE THE FINAL PROJECT
card2.description: Following the respect of deadlines, the entire project must be completed before Glowing Day and sent for pre-validation

card3.title: MAKE A GOOD PRESENTATION
card3.description: The good presentation of the project increases its value

skillsDescription.title: EVOLVE YOUR
skillsDescription.description: LEARN 100% DIGITAL SKILLS ADAPTED TO YOUR NEEDS WITH OPUS LAB

skillCard1.title: WEB DEVELOPMENT
skillCard1.description: Join one of the most demanded domains in the market and start learning the basics of web development. this program is 100% suitable for beginners, you can either study part time or full time.

skillCard2.title: REACT JS
skillCard2.description: Join one of the most demanded domains in the market and start learning the basics of web development. this program is 100% suitable for beginners, you can either study part time or full time.

skillCard3.title: NODE JS
skillCard3.description: Join one of the most demanded domains in the market and start learning the basics of web development. this program is 100% suitable for beginners, you can either study part time or full time.

list1.title: MINI TASKS AND MCQ
list1.description: These mini tasks during the training help students validate the understanding of the concepts learned.

list2.title: TASKS AND MINI PROJECTS
list2.description: After each session, the student has a mini project to develop at home to practice everything he has learned.

list3.title: CHECKPOINTS
list3.description: Each week, the instructor performs a checkpoint with the students to follow the progress of the tasks.

list4.title: UNLIMITED ACCESS TO THE INSTRUCTOR
list4.description: The student can contact the instructor at any time possible if he needs help.

yourEvolution.title: YOUR EVOLUTION.. OUR OBJECTIVE !
yourEvolution.description: Through our continuous monitoring system, our regular checkpoints and your unlimited access to the instructor, we aim to concretize your evolution and encourage you to practice what you have learned!

stepByStep.title: step by step to professional life
stepByStep.decription: We always want to bring you closer to professional life through our tasks and our advice. We also want to always share the right profiles with our key partners for hiring or internship requests.

opusBusiness.title: OPUS BUSINESS
opusBusiness.description: At Opus Lab, the team is the strength of the company. Every effort of every team member contributes to the success of our Startup. Our students are part of this success following their confidence as well as their testimonies!
opusBusiness.question: Want to join the Opus family?
